Ğ—Ğ´ĞµÑÑŒ, ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ°Ğ´Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ñ… Blue Shift Ğ¸ Decay, Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¶Ğµ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ´Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ğ² Ğ½Ğ°ÑƒÑ‡Ğ½Ğ¾-Ğ¸ÑÑĞ»ĞµĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¼ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞºÑĞµ Black Mesa, Ñ†ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ³ÑƒÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ñ… ÑĞ²Ğ»ÑĞ»ÑÑ Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ Ğ“Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¤Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½, Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ², ĞºĞ°Ğ¶Ğ´Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ· ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñƒ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµÑ‡Ñ‘Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ² ĞºÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼ĞµÑˆĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ°Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½.

ĞĞ°Ñˆ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ â€“ ĞĞ´Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´, Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ‡Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ¿Ğ¿Ñ‹ ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ½Ğ°Ğ·Ğ°, Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Â«ÑĞ¿Ğ°ÑĞ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞºĞµÂ» Ğ½Ğ° ÑĞ²ĞµÑ€Ñ…ÑĞµĞºÑ€ĞµÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¾Ğ±ÑŠĞµĞºÑ‚Ğµ. ĞŸĞ¾ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¾Ğ½ Ñ‚ÑƒĞ´Ğ°, Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ÑÑ, Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½. ĞĞ° Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ñƒ Ğ´ĞµÑĞ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ° Ğº Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ½Ğµ Ğ²Ñ‹ÑĞ°Ğ´ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¼Ñ‹ Ğ»ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğµ ÑĞ¾ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‰Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‡Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ñƒ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ñ‹ Ğ¸ Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ½ÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‰ÑŒ (ÑĞ¾Ğ±ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾, ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¸ ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²ÑˆĞµÑÑ‚Ğ² - Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸ Ğ¼Ñ‹ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµĞ¼ ÑÑ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¸, Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºÑ€Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ¸ĞµĞ¼ Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‹ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ†Ğ¾Ğ²). ĞĞ¾ Ğ²Ğ½ĞµĞ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ²Ğ»ÑÑÑ‰Ğ¸ĞµÑÑ Ğ² Ğ½ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ»ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ ÑÑƒÑ‰ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ²Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ½ĞµĞ·ĞµĞ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸ÑÑ…Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑƒÑÑ‚ Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ‘Ñ‚ Ğ¸ ÑÑĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ°ÑÑ‚ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ½ÑÑ‚ÑŒ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ²ÑÑ‘ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ´Ñ‘Ñ‚ ÑĞ¾Ğ²ÑĞµĞ¼ Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº, ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ÑÑŒâ€¦

Ğ”Ğ°, ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞºÑ Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ½ĞµĞ¸Ğ·Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ ÑĞ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ (Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‡Ñ‘Ğ¼ ÑÑ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñƒ Ğ´Ğ²ÑƒĞ¼Ñ â€“ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ĞµÑ‚ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¸ Â«Ğ»ÑĞ´ÑŒĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ² Ñ‡Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑĞµÂ»), Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¸ ÑÑ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñƒ Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ² Ğ¿ĞµĞºĞ»Ğ¾. Ğ Ğ°Ğ·ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ÑÑ, Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµÑ‚ Ñ‚Ğ° ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ°Ñ Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‡Ğ° Ñ Ñ…ÑĞ´ĞºÑ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¸ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ğµ, Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼, Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ÑÑ, ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ´ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ ÑƒĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼ÑĞ½ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒ. Ğš Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ñƒ Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ° Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ³ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ Ğ¸, Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ Ğ¸ Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ° Ñ‚ĞµĞ¿Ğ»Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ° Ğ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹, Ğ½Ğµ Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ° ĞµÑ‰Ñ‘ Ñ‚ĞµĞ¼ Ğ¡Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¼. Ğ—Ğ´ĞµÑÑŒ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Valve (Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑŒ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°) â€“ Ğ² Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ¸ Ğ½ĞµÑ‚. Ğ”Ğ°, Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ²Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑŒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡ Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¶, Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾, ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ²Ñ‹ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°ĞµÑ‚Ğµ, Ğ°Ğ±ÑĞ¾Ğ»ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾; ÑĞºÑĞºĞ»ÑĞ·Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¤Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ÑÑŒ ÑĞºÑĞºĞ»ÑĞ·Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¾ÑˆĞ»Ğ¾ Ğ² Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ, ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ¼ÑĞ³ĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑ†Ğ° Ñ…ĞµĞ´ĞºÑ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ².

ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ñ‘Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ½Ğ° 12 Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²-ÑĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ñ‹ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾ Ğ¿ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ñ‡Ğ°ÑĞ¾Ğ². Ğ—Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ²Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‰Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ¸Ğ· ÑˆÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ² Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½ÑƒÑ, Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½ÑƒÑ, Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ² Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½ÑƒÑ Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»ĞµĞµ Ğ² Ğ½ĞµĞ¾Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑÑƒĞµĞ¼ÑƒÑ. ĞšĞ°Ğº ÑƒĞ¶Ğµ Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ¾ ÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ĞµÑ‚ÑĞ½Ğµ, Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ĞºÑƒ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ¾ Ğ½ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ… ÑĞºĞ·ĞµĞ¼Ğ¿Ğ»ÑÑ€Ğ¾Ğ² (ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ ÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ ÑÑ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ² Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ñ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸, Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ñ‹ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Half-Life Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ‚ÑÑ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ² ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ), Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‡Ñ‘Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ²ÑÑ‘ Ñ‡Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ñ‡Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ñ‹ Ğ½ĞµĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ½ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ´ĞµĞ±Ğ½Ñ‹ ĞºĞ¾ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ¼ Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ñ‹Ñ‡ĞºĞ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ĞµÑ‚ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸ Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†ĞµĞ·Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ.

ĞÑ€ÑĞµĞ½Ğ°Ğ» Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ»ÑÑ Ğ½ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ñ - ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ·ĞµĞ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº Ğ¸ Ğ½ĞµĞ·ĞµĞ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ (Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ÑÑ, Ğ² ĞšÑĞµĞ½ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½ĞµÑÑ‘Ñ‚ ÑÑƒĞ´ÑŒĞ±Ğ°), Ğ¸Ğ· ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€ĞµÑ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑÑÑ‚ ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ÑĞºĞ°Ñ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ°, Ğ¿ÑƒĞ»ĞµĞ¼Ñ‘Ñ‚, Ñ„Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ğµ, ÑĞ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² ĞšÑĞµĞ½, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ ĞµÑ‰Ñ‘ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğµ ÑĞ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑŒÑˆĞµ Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞµĞ»Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ĞºĞµ Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾ ÑĞ¶ĞµĞ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ²ÑÑ‘, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾ÑĞ½Ñ‘Ñ‚ÑÑ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Â«ÑĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ°Â», Ğ° Ñ‚ĞµĞ¿ĞµÑ€ÑŒ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ·ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ² Ñ€ÑƒĞºĞ¸ Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€ĞµÑĞ°Ñ….

Se trata de una historia que se desarrolla al mismo tiempo que la de Gordon Freeman, solo que esta vez controlas a uno de los soldados que llegan a la base, y â™¥â™¥â™¥ lo cual puedes ver el conflicto desde ese punto de vista. Al ser como una pequeÃ±a expansiÃ³n de Half-Life, solo comentarÃ© los 2 puntos mÃ¡s destacables.

Jugabilidad

En cuanto a jugabilidad, como es obvio, es igual que el primer Half-Life. O lo que es lo mismo, un shooter que pese a tener mÃ¡s de 10 aÃ±os, se hace super disfrutable.
De hecho, para tener un pequeÃ±o cambio de aires, en este juego te encuentras â™¥â™¥â™¥ algunas armas distintas de las del primer Half-Life. Algunas muy divertidas de usar, otras un poco tostÃ³n, pero mola el cambio igualmente.

Historia

El ver la trama desde otro punto de vista, te desvela varias cosas que se quedaron un poco en el limbo en el primer Half-Life. Como por quÃ© llegaron soldados, su opiniÃ³n al respecto, o que ocurriÃ³ â™¥â™¥â™¥ ellos al final de todo el lÃ­o.

En general recomiendo jugar este jueguito una vez os pasÃ©is el Half-Life. Es cortito (5-6 horas), descubrÃ­s cosas nuevas del conflicto, y estÃ¡ tan bien hecho como cualquier otro Half-Life.

RecommandÃ©
6.4 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 15 fÃ©vrier 2020
Opposing force is a separated game, but it is actually a DLC of Half-Life, talking about what is happening in Black Mesa during Gordon is transported to the alien planet Xen. Using the materials and mechanisms from Half-Life, opposing force has some very similar or exactly the same scenes in Half-Life, and plays almost in the same way as Half-Life, except it is much harder than Half-Life in a less enjoyable way.

Beside some defeats in mechanisms inherited from Half-Life, my problem with this game is its aim. When you use night vision, which performs the same function as flashlight in Half-Life, you can barely see the aim as it is small, green which is the same color of night vision, making aiming very difficult. Other than that, nothing is too bad. It is just an average supplement and not as amazing as Half-Life.
 
Oi

4.9 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 5 dÃ©cembre 2016
Von der anderen Seite

Ich habe mich immer als Half-Life Fan bezeichnet und habe mich glatt geschÃ¤mt, als ich bemerkte, dass ich die beiden Erweiterungen zum ersten Teil "Blue Shift" und "Opposing Forces" noch nie gespielt hatte, geschweige denn davon gehÃ¶rt. Da ich Blue Shift schon durchgespielt habe, kann ich es ganz gut mit Opposing Force vergleichen.

Gameplay
Auch Opposing Force bleibt Half-Life treu. Wir prÃ¼geln und ballern uns durch die Level, wobei wir diesmal leider keine Brechstange, sondern nur eine Rohrzange haben. Eindeutig der grÃ¶ÃŸte Makel am Spiel!
Opposing Force bietet eine etwas lÃ¤ngere Spielzeit als Blue Shift, in der wir auch wesentlich mehr gegen Aliens kÃ¤mpfen und auch "Zwischenbosse" und sogar einen Endboss haben. Hier orientiert sich die Erweiterung eher am Hauptspiel. Besonders gefallen haben mir die neuen Waffen. Statt dem Revolver gibts ne einfach ne andere stÃ¤rkere Pistole, ein ScharfschÃ¼tzengewehr, diverses anderes und mehrere neue Alienwaffen. Teilweise wurde es mir schon fast zu unÃ¼bersichtlich bei dem Arsenal, was man dabei hat.

Der Multiplayer ist wie erwartet, nahezu leer. Auf die "volleren" bin ich teilweise aufgrund eines Fehlers Ã¼berhaupt nicht draufgekommen. Aber das ist bei so einem alten Spiel auch nicht so schlimm.

Story
Wie der Titel schon sagt, stehen wir auf der anderen Seite. Wir spielen Adrian Sheppard, einen Soldaten, welcher nach Black Mesa gerufen wird, um alle Ãœberlebenden, vorallem Gordon, auszuschalten. Direkt zu Beginn crasht der Helikopter und wir wollen eigentlich nur noch entkommen. Denn die dazugerufenen BlackOps Soldaten jagen nun auch uns und wir geben unser Bestes, aus Black Mesa zu verschwinden. Dabei ballern wir aber nicht wie die anderen Soldaten alle Zivilisten Ã¼ber den Haufen, sondern arbeiten mit ihnen zusammen. Besonders schÃ¶n fand ich, dass man auch mit den anderen Soldaten interagieren konnte und auch auf Pioniere/SanitÃ¤ter angewiesen war.
Auch wenn wir fast gar nicht in der Xen-Dimension sind, bekommen wir in "Opposing Force" einen guten Eindruck, was Black Mesa eigentlich da betreibt und bekommen einen Einblick, wieviel bereits Ã¼ber die Xen-Dimension bekannt ist.
Die Story ist nicht Ã¼bermÃ¤ÃŸig stark aufgelegt, aber ist eine super ErgÃ¤nzung zur Hauptgeschichte und noch etwas besser umgesetzt als in Blue Shift.

Grafik/Sound
Da hat sich nicht viel verÃ¤ndert. Die Sounds sind etwas einseitig bzw. "klobig" und die Grafik ist unverÃ¤ndert.

Fazit
Half-Life Opposing Force hat mich ein StÃ¼ck mehr Ã¼berzeugt als sein Bruder "Blue Shift". Die Story ist lÃ¤nger, es gibt grÃ¶ÃŸere "epische" KÃ¤mpfe und auch die Idee, Soldat zu sein, Ã¼berzeugt mich. Auch die groÃŸe Auswahl an Knarren ist hier noch ein dicker Pluspunkt.
Daher kann ich das Spiel jedem empfehlen, der das Hauptspiel und/oder Blue Shift gespielt hat, da ich Opposing Force noch fÃ¼r besser halte. Half-Life lohnt sich eh auf jeden Fall! :-)


Hat dir das Review weitergeholfen? Dann folge mir doch in meiner Steamgruppe, wo ich meine Reviews als Kurator verfasse.

Produit reÃ§u gratuitement

Extremely fun expansion for the original Half-Life. One of Randy Pitchford's last enjoyable games he put out. [Not much of a Pitchford fan after all the crap he's said over the years.]

Jokes aside,

I'm going to go ahead and sin myself as I have never actually played the original games until late December of 2019. I bought it while I had the money and while it was 99 Cents. Which is a pretty amazing price for a game I didn't exactly want to try out at first. I finally got to experience both Blue Shift and Opposing Forces after they were made free for the duration of two months to get people excited for the new Half Life VR title that's coming out in two months.

The original half life is considered to be one, if not one of the biggest master pieces that Valve had released back in the 90's. But if I went ahead and told you all something, I'd tell you that this expansion just makes the experience much better in my own eyes. Not only do you get to play as the badass Adrian Shepard. You can finally command the HECU forces without being shot down like the bullet sponge you are in the original three games. [Half Life, Opposing Forces, and Blueshift] and unlike the other two pieces of the game, Opposing forces offers a more action paced story. But the story isn't as long as let's say Blue Shift and the original game itself.

I have to say, the chapters in this side of HL1's Original story are much more interesting than what Blue shift offered to us. The game sends us right into the incident Gordon 'Caused' in the first game. And right after that, It just gets much much better as you go on.

Opposing Forces Soundtrack is killer, Bust has to be one of my favorite tracks in the game, as it gets you pumped and fully attached into the game.

In all shortness, If you liked Half Life, you are certainly going to love Opposing Forces.

Oh and, Stay tuned for my Blue Shift review.

and uhhh.. turn on raw mouse input. That's your fix for the mouse issues.
 
Rdup222

Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 8 juillet 2015
Half-Life: Opposing Force es un FPS (First Person Shooter) en donde, el jugador juega como el militar de la H.E.C.U,
Adrian Shepard, â™¥â™¥â™¥ el propÃ³sito de eliminar a Gordon Freeman, evacuar a los sobrevivientes restantes y despejar las
Ã¡reas infectadas en el laboratorio de Black Mesa.

Half-Life: Opposing Force es la segunda expansiÃ³n de Half-Life, esta vez, â™¥â™¥â™¥ armas aÃºn mÃ¡s innovadoras y nuevos seres
alienÃ­genas provenientes de un planeta desconocido.

A comparaciÃ³n de Half-Life, el Half-Life: Opposing Force, cuenta â™¥â™¥â™¥ nuevas armas, tales como una criatura â™¥â™¥â™¥ forma
de hormiga que dispara rayos elÃ©ctricos, o una criatura que dispara bolas de Ã¡cido, similar a un lanzacohetes.

Los alienÃ­genas que se presentan en esta expansiÃ³n, no solo vendrÃ¡n desde el mundo fronterizo, Xen, sino, tambiÃ©n
vendrÃ¡n nuevas criaturas desde un planeta desconocido. Estas criaturas son denominadas como "Race X".

Sin mÃ¡s nada que decir, Half-Life: Opposing Force, es parte de esas expansiones â™¥â™¥â™¥ una duraciÃ³n larga, pero que al
finalizarlo, te sentirÃ¡s completamente satisfecho.

Mi calificaciÃ³n para este videojuego es de: 9.5 / 10

1 personne a trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation amusante

RecommandÃ©
10.2 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 17 juin 2016
A fine expansion. It builds upon the legendary HL gameplay (Run. Think. Shoot. Live.) and expands it with a myriad of new weapons, including many exotic ones, and many new enemies, mainly the menacing Race X. They will shoot you with lightning, poisonous darts and discharges of energy. Hazard Course was changed for a glorious Boot Camp where many drill sergeants (stereotyped after the film Full Metal Jacket) will degrade you to dirtbags, maggots and other derogatory existences. The game possesses a brilliant minimalistic soundtrack very different from the original Half-Life. AI is still quite buggy, doesn't like to follow you, gets stuck. There is no crowbar, all weapons were changed visually and functionally. There are many original features like the Barnacle Grapple that will help you latch onto organic objects and "suck" your way into them. M-40A1 Sniper Rifle, Shock Roach, Spore Launcher, XV11382, a laser sight Desert Eagle, all new toys. There are a few annoyances like operating the mortar and music stopping after loading. If you liked the original Half-Life you will love this.
 
Globster

æ•µã¯ã€å†’é ­ã“ãã‚¯ãƒ©ãƒ–ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚„ãã‚Œã«å¯„ç”Ÿã•ã‚ŒãŸç ”ç©¶å“¡ãƒ»å…µå£«ãŒä¸»ã ãŒä¸­ç›¤è¾ºã‚Šã‹ã‚‰æœ¬ç·¨ã«å‡ºã¦ããŸé«˜é€Ÿç§»å‹•ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‹ãƒ³ã‚¸ãƒ£éƒ¨éšŠã‚„ã‚°ãƒ¬ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰å¼¾ã‚’å¤šç”¨ã™ã‚‹æš—æ®ºéƒ¨éšŠã€ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ»ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ã‚ºã«å‡ºã¦ããã†ãªæ–°ã—ã„ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã®ç”²æ®»é¡ã‚¨ã‚¤ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ³ãŒå¤šããªã‚‹ã€‚ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯é—‡ã«åŒ…ã¾ã‚ŒãŸç®‡æ‰€ãŒå¤šããªã‚Šã€æš—è¦–ã‚´ãƒ¼ã‚°ãƒ«ã‚’å¤šæ§˜ã—ã¤ã¤ç¡¬ã„ç”²æ®»é¡ãŒå¤šãã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€Half-Lifeã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®è¦ç´ ãŒé«˜ã‚ã ã£ãŸã€‚ç¦ã€…ã—ã„ç´«ã®ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰é€™ã„å‡ºã¦ãã‚‹ã‚¿ã‚³ã®æ€ªç‰©ã¿ãŸã„ãªã®ãŒãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒœã‚¹ã€‚ä¸¡ç›®ã‚’ç ²å°ã§æ½°ã—ã¦ã‹ã‚‰ã€å£ã‚’é–‹ã‘ã‚‹ã¨å‡ºã¦ãã‚‹ç´«ã®å…‰çƒã‚’ç‹™ã†ã€‚æ•°å›ç¹°ã‚Šè¿”ã™ã¨å€’ã›ã‚‹ã€‚åŒã˜GearBoxSoftwareãŒè£½ä½œã—ãŸ2009å¹´ã® ã€ŒBorderlandsã€ã®ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒœã‚¹ãƒ‡ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ­ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ã¨éå¸¸ã«ç‰¹å¾´ãŒé…·ä¼¼ã—ã¦ã„ã¦æ˜ã‚‰ã‹ã«ã‚ªãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ¥å…ƒã§ã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã†ã‹ãŒã„çŸ¥ã‚Œã‚‹ã€‚

seiichirou2

RecommandÃ©
15.8 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 8 avril 2017
(I reccomend you read this one first)
Opposing force is very similar to Half-Life, and has you facing a different, but similar group of alien's, as well as some that we have seen from Half-Life. You play as one of the military soldiers that enters Black Mesa, but the twist is that you were never told what you are doing there. There is even a part where you can kill a soldier to save a scientist and get some armor. It introduces new mechanics such as rope climbing, and new puzzles as well. I highly reccomend this game. There are only a few downsides to this game that I did not find in other games. The first is that, despite the training room and the story making you feel like a soldier, and that in Half-Life, you see soldiers everywhere, here you don't see many soldiers that you actually take into combat until about the second half of the game. Even then, you don't work with nearly the amount you fight at once in Half-Life. They also feel the need to put in black-op's soldiers to fight, which I feel is unnecessary (I mean, they have a soldier-like enemy in every HL and HL2 game. I'm more interested in fighting aliens) but it fits. However, I do not understand why you encounter more Black Ops than your own soldiers. The only other negative side to this game is that the boss fight is way easier than it is in Half-Life, for reasons I will not share here. I Still reccomend playing through it though, as the positives outweigh the negatives.
 
Eric

1

RecommandÃ©

Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 7 aout 2023

ĞĞµ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½ÑƒĞ»Ğ° Ñ†Ñ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ Ñ– Half-Life.
ĞŸÑ–ÑĞ»Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¼ÑˆĞ»Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑƒÑĞ¿Ñ–Ñ…Ñƒ Ğ· Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ Half-Life Ñƒ 1998 Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ†Ñ–, ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ´Ñ–Ñ Valve Ñƒ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†Ñ–Ñ— Ğ· Gearbox Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ€Ñ–ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¼ Ñ‰Ğµ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¶, Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ–Ğ´ Ñ–Ğ½ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¼ ĞºÑƒÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼. Ğ¢Ğ°ĞºĞ¸Ğ¼ Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ñƒ 1999 Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ†Ñ– Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑˆĞ»Ğ° Half-Life: Opposing Force â€“ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ° ÑÑĞ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğ½Ğ° ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½Ñ–Ñ, Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ–Ğ´Ğ°Ñ” Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ñ Ğ· Ğ±Ğ¾ĞºÑƒ Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¼Ñ–Ñ—.

ĞŸĞ¾Ğ´Ñ–Ñ— Opposing Force Ğ²Ñ–Ğ´Ğ±ÑƒĞ²Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ°ÑĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ· Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ–ÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ–Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ñ— Half-Life, Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ· ĞºÑ–Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ° Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿Ñ–ÑĞ»Ñ ĞºĞ°ÑĞºĞ°Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ñ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ½ÑÑƒ. Ğ“Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²ĞµÑ†ÑŒ Ğ²Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ°Ñ” Ğ² Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ– ĞºĞ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° Ğ•Ğ´Ñ€Ñ–Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ°, Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ· ÑĞ¾Ğ»Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ–Ğ² ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ¿Ñ–Ğ´Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ñ–Ğ»Ñƒ HECU (Hazardous Environment Combat Unit), Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ´Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞºÑÑƒ Â«Ğ§Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ½Ğ° ĞœĞµĞ·Ğ°Â» Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ±ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ†Ñ–Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ·Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‰ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ Ğ²ÑÑ–Ñ… ÑĞ²Ñ–Ğ´ĞºÑ–Ğ².
ĞŸÑ–Ğ´ Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¸ (Ğ² ÑĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ½ÑŒĞ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ‚Ñ€ÑŒĞ¾Ñ…Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ— ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½Ñ–Ñ—) ÑˆĞ»ÑÑ…Ğ¸ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ñ– Ğ“Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ñ–Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ– Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑÑ, Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ±ÑƒĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº, Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ²Ğ·Ğ°Ñ”Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ–ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ñ–Ğ¶ ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ. ĞÑ–ĞºÑƒĞ´Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ–Ğ²ÑÑ Ñ– Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ”Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ¹ G-man. Ğ†Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ– Ğ²Ñ–Ğ½ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğµ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ñƒ, Ğ° Ñ–Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ–, Ğ½Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¿Ğ°ĞºĞ¸, Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğµ. ĞĞ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºÑ–Ğ½Ñ†Ñ– Ğ¶ Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¸, G-man Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°, Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ–ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²ÑˆĞ¸ Ğ¹Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ñƒ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ·Ñ–Ñ.

Ğ†Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´ Ñƒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ–Ğ²Ğ½ÑĞ½Ğ½Ñ– Half-Life Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ·Ğ¼Ñ–Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²ÑÑ, Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑŒ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ– Ğ¼ĞµÑ…Ğ°Ğ½Ñ–ĞºĞ¸. Ğ’Ñ–Ğ´Ñ‚ĞµĞ¿ĞµÑ€ ÑĞ¾ÑĞ·Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ°, Ğ° Ñ†Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ–Ğ½ÑˆÑ– Ğ²Ñ–Ğ¹ÑÑŒĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾ÑĞ»ÑƒĞ¶Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ†Ñ– ÑĞº Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¼ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğº Ñ‚Ğ° ÑĞ°Ğ¿ĞµÑ€, Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚Ñ–Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ ÑĞ»Ñ–Ğ´ÑƒÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ñ†ĞµĞ¼ Ñ– ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ñ–Ğ»ÑÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°Ñ…, Ğ° Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ÑƒÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ñ–Ğ½ÑˆÑ– ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¸ÑĞ½Ñ– Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ñ–Ñ—: Ğ»Ñ–ĞºÑƒÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ñ– Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·ĞºÑ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ½ĞµĞ½Ñ– Ğ´Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ñ–. Ğ†Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ– Ğ½Ğ° Ñ†Ñ–Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ·Ğ°Ñ”Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ–Ñ— Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ±ÑƒĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ñ– Ñ†Ñ–Ğ»Ñ– Ğ½ĞµĞ²ĞµĞ»Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞºÑ– Ğ¼Ñ–ÑÑ–Ñ— â€“ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¼ĞµĞ´Ğ¸ĞºĞ°, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¹Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ°Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°, Ñ‰Ğ¾Ğ± Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ»Ñ–ĞºÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ğ² Ğ¹Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ğ° ÑĞ°Ğ¿ĞµÑ€, Ñƒ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ñ Ñ‡ĞµÑ€Ğ³Ñƒ, Ğ²Ñ–Ğ´ĞºÑ€Ğ¸Ğ² Ğ´Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ñ–. Ğ¢Ğ°ĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ–Ğ´Ñ…Ñ–Ğ´ Ğ´Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾ÑĞ·Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºÑ–Ğ² Ğ´ÑƒĞ¶Ğµ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†ÑÑ”, Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ñ‚ĞµĞ¿ĞµÑ€ Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²ĞµÑ†ÑŒ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ²Ñ–Ğ´Ñ‡ÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ñ” ÑĞµĞ±Ğµ Ñ”Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ Ğ·Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‰Ğ¾ÑÑŒ Ğ»ÑĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ, Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ· Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ»Ñ–Ñ‡-Ğ¾-Ğ¿Ğ»Ñ–Ñ‡, Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ğ½ĞµĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ” Ğ½Ğ° Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ„ĞµÑ€Ñƒ. ĞšÑ€Ñ–Ğ¼ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ñ–Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ– Ğ½Ğ° ÑˆĞ»ÑÑ…Ñƒ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ğ·ÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ€Ñ–Ñ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ´Ñ–Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ñ†Ñ–Ñ— Ğ²Ñ–Ğ¹ÑÑŒĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ·Ğ° Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ ÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ²Ñ–Ğ½ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ´Ñ–Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑÑ ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ÑƒĞ°Ñ†Ñ–Ñ Ñ– Ğ²Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ñƒ. Ğ£ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ– ÑÑƒĞ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºÑ–Ğ² Ñ‚ĞµĞ¶ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ±ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾, Ñ– ĞºÑ€Ñ–Ğ¼ ÑƒĞ¶Ğµ Â«Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ…Â» Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ±ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ†Ñ–Ğ² Ñ–Ğ· Ğ—ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ñ– Ğ§Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºÑ–Ğ², Ğ² Opposing Force Ğ½Ğ° ÑÑ†ĞµĞ½Ñƒ Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ– Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸ â€“ Ğ Ğ°ÑĞ° Ğ˜ĞºÑ, ÑĞºĞ° Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµÑĞ»Ñ–Ğ´ÑƒÑ” ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ñ— Ñ†Ñ–Ğ»Ñ– Ñ– Ğ·â€™ÑĞ²Ğ»ÑÑ”Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ²Ğ¸ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ² Opposing Force. Ğ’Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¶Ñ– ÑĞº Ğ´Ğ¾ ÑƒÑÑ–Ñ… Ğ»ÑĞ´ĞµĞ¹, Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº Ñ– Ğ´Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ±ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ†Ñ–Ğ² Ğ—ĞµĞ½Ğ°. ĞŸĞ¾ÑĞ²Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ˜ĞºÑ Ñ†Ñ–Ğ»ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ° ÑĞ¾Ğ²Ñ–ÑÑ‚Ñ– Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºÑ–Ğ² Ğ· Gearbox Software. Ğ£ ÑĞ²Ñ–Ğ¹ Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€ÑĞ²Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ÑÑ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ Opposing Force â€“ Opposing Force 2, Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±ĞºĞ° Ğ±ÑƒĞ»Ğ° Ğ·ÑƒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ğ½Ğ° Ğ½ĞµĞ²Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ñ–Ğ½ Ñ–, Ğ²Ñ€Ğ°Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ²ÑƒÑÑ‡Ğ¸ ÑĞºÑ–Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¸ Ñ‡Ğ°ÑÑƒ Ğ²Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑˆĞ»Ğ¾, Ğ²Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ½Ñ–ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹Ğ´Ğµ.
ĞĞ´Ğ½Ğ°Ğº Ñ–Ğ½ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¼ Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ±ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‰ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ Opposing Force Ñƒ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ»ÑĞ´Ñ– Ğ¾ĞºÑ€ĞµĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ— ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ñ†Ñ–Ğ¹Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ— Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¸ â€“ Prospekt, Ğ·Ğ° ÑÑĞ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑĞºĞ¾Ñ— Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ½Ñ– Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ€Ñ–ÑˆÑƒÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ½ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ•Ğ´Ñ€Ñ–Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ğ·Ñ– ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸ÑÑƒ, ĞºÑƒĞ´Ğ¸ Ğ¹Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñ–ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ² G-Man, Ñ‰Ğ¾Ğ± Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ² Ğ¤Ñ€Ñ–Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ğ· Ğ²â€™ÑĞ·Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ– ĞĞ»ÑŒÑĞ½ÑÑƒ â€“ ĞĞ¾Ğ²Ğ° ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾ÑĞ¿ĞµĞºÑ‚.

Ğ¯Ğº Ñ– Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ–Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ° Half-Life, Opposing Force Ğ·Ñ–Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ñ– Ğ²Ñ–Ğ´Ğ³ÑƒĞºĞ¸, Ğ·Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ– Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¶Ñ– Ğ´Ğ¸ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ— Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑÑ–Ñ— Opposing Force ÑĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ 1,1 Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ½ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ–Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºÑ–Ğ², Ğ° Ğ½Ğ° Metacritic Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° 8,6 Ğ±Ğ°Ğ»Ñ–Ğ², Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ° Ğ²Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ ÑƒÑĞ¿Ñ–Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑĞº Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ½ĞµĞ²ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ñ‡Ğ°ÑÑƒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ Ğ°Ğ´Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½Ñƒ.

Lol4ik_Pon4ik(ĞšÑ–Ñ‚)
107 produits enregistrÃ©s

9 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
1 personne a trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation amusante
0
RecommandÃ©
1,032.3 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 31 juillet 2021
Phenomenal.
Gearbox has literally outdone them self on this masterpiece of a game. With strikingly superior graphics for this games time and innovative story telling, this game honestly deserves a remaster.
I remember sitting, waiting for this game to be released at a young age after beating the first Half-Life.
The story is fantastic, showing a different perspective. Instead of being the protagonist Gordon Freeman, you now take place as an antagonist known as Adrian Shepard. Moving on the the multi player, it is insanely fun. The excessive amount of explosions going on around you is an exciting add-on to this game. With servers still running 20 years later, this game is fantastic. Don't think that Opposing Force lacks a cooperative mode, because one Coop server is currently running with a maximum slot of 32 players per match.

Overall, this game is a splendid masterpiece and I would recommend anyone buying. It's worth spending on a game such as this one.

Non recommandÃ©
8.6 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 10 mars 2020
As someone who absolutely loves Half Life, this game has disappointed me. It's one of the most frustrating experience i've ever had while playing a video game. The game does a terrible job in delivering health packs and that coupled with the god awful amount of action going on means you're dying all the time. Along with that, the terrible AI (marines which are supposed to protect you, actually shoot you at times), frequent glitches (I got stuck on the elevator floors due to which i had to revert to previous save) and frequent crashes make the already bad experience even worse.

The only and LITERALLY the only thing which this game does good are the new BADASS weapons (really-really loved the â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥ off to the xen gun), but thats about it in my opinion. Blueshift was a way better expansion to be honest.

Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 2 octobre 2017
Opossing force, la primera expansion oficial para half life nos relata la historia del cabo shepard que fue enviado a black mesa durante los eventos ocurridos en el juego base.

MÃ¡s que una expansion puedo atreverme a decir que el titulo lo tiene todo para ser un juego diferente, incluye nuevas armas y enemigos, aumentando la variedad de las armas vistas en half life ( aunque hay armas del juego original que tampoco lograremos manipular )

La dificultad se hace verdaderamente un reto en dificil â™¥â™¥â™¥ los nuevos enemigos que superan por mucho los vistos anteriormente, estos nuevos enemigos tienen mucha mayor resistencia, velocidad y tienen armas a distancia que son dificiles de esquivar. en lo personal el juego tuvo su desafio y me gusto mucho.

El juego esta en ingles, pero si buscas en internet puedes encontrar rapidamente los archivos para poner el juego â™¥â™¥â™¥ voces en espaÃ±ol. este titulo viene â™¥â™¥â™¥ muchisimas novedades y tienes una vision diferente de lo que ocurre en black mesa, jugar como uno de los personajes "malos" de half life no te deja las cosas faciles. hay que recordar que hay otro equipo gubernamental que tuvo una pequeÃ±a participacion en half life pero que en esta expansion nos hace la vida imposible, me refiero a los comandos negros, que son desplegados cuando los soldados como shepard fueron sobrepasados por los alienigenas.

La cosa se equilibra un poco â™¥â™¥â™¥ la posibilidad de aliarse a los demas militares, estos tienen habilidades unicas tales como abrir puertas o un medico que funciona igual que un cargador de vida. estos aliados npc te siguen â™¥â™¥â™¥ mayor velocidad que lo hacian los cientificos del half life, sin embargo no todo lo que brilla es oro, como siempre hay que estar cada tanto asegurandose que te esten siguendo para poder usarlos mas adelante o que te den fuego de cobertura.

Lo recomiendo, es una expansion que no te deja â™¥â™¥â™¥ gusto a poco o un mal sabor, si aun no has jugado ninguna expansion recomiendo empezar â™¥â™¥â™¥ blue shift ya que es mucho mÃ¡s corta y â™¥â™¥â™¥ menos innovacion, asi despues juegas esta y terminas â™¥â™¥â™¥ broche de oro la saga original.
 
Sir Alfred

RecommandÃ©
8.4 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 8 novembre 2014
Fantastic expansion for the half-life universe.

New weapons, more pleasant encounters with scientist than in the first half-life.

More complex HECU units with more variety in the apperal aspect of the soldiers.

Different skillsets for soldiers in your platoon I.E.; Engineer Torching down sealed doors, medics for healing, etc.

I recommend you save frequently because them auto-saves are IMO not frequent enough.

Sadly the military still wants to kill you even though your on they're team

( Exluding the HECU soldiers known for their grey camo and Green PCV vest, enemy military units will be in all black. )
 
Allen Scott

RecommandÃ©
5.2 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 28 octobre 2016
Opposing Force, the 1st of the three Gearbox expansions for Half-Life, re-tells the story of the Black Mesa Incident from HECU marine Adrian Shephard's perspective. Adding a plethora of new content like Race X (not to be confused with Xen creatures,) and additional weapons; Opposing Force offers an enjoyable yet distinct experience, albeit with somewhat muddled level design. Consider buying it if you enjoy the original Half-Life.
 
Dante from Devil May Cry

Half-Life: Opposing Force trata como fue el asalto militar en los Laboratorios de Black Mesa desde la perspectiva de los soldados de las fuerzas especiales HECU. En esta historia controlamos al soldado Adrian Shepard.
Es un DLC bastante bueno porque cuenta â™¥â™¥â™¥ mÃ¡s armas, una duraciÃ³n aproximada de 3 o 4 horas, nuevos enemigos y un par de mecÃ¡nicas nuevas, ademÃ¡s de la acciÃ³n y un par de puzzles. Los puntos negativos son que la IA a veces es bastante estÃºpida, en una parte el juego se crashea (aunque te puede pasar en otra parte el crasheo y â™¥â™¥â™¥ que cargues un guardado anterior se soluciona) y los NPC te hablan en inglÃ©s o te mezclan el inglÃ©s â™¥â™¥â™¥ el espaÃ±ol.
Si empiezas una partida pero tu mouse se queda trabado ve a opciones- ratÃ³n (si no recuerdo mal) y desactiva una opciÃ³n que se llama "Raw mouse imput" (esto tambiÃ©n funciona â™¥â™¥â™¥ el DLC de Blue Shift).
Este DLC me encantÃ³ y ademÃ¡s estÃ¡ barato.
Espero ver de nuevo a Adrian en algÃºn juego prÃ³ximo.

1998å¹´å‘å”®çš„ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½1ã€‹ç›¸ä¿¡æ˜¯è®¸å¤šç©å®¶çš„å¯è’™ä¹‹ä½œå’Œç«¥å¹´å›å¿†ï¼Œè¿™æ¬¾20å¤šå¹´å‰çš„æ¸¸æˆå³ä½¿ç°åœ¨ç©èµ·æ¥ä¹Ÿä¾ç„¶å¾ˆæœ‰è¶£ï¼šæ‰®æ¼”ä¸€åç§‘å­¦å®¶é€ƒç¦»å±é™©é‡é‡çš„é»‘å±±åŸºåœ°å¹¶ç›´æ£å¼‚å½¢è€å·¢ï¼Œè¿™æ®µå¥‡å¦™è€Œåˆºæ¿€çš„æ—…é€”çœŸæ˜¯ä»¤äººéš¾å¿˜ï¼Œè€Œæ›´åŠ ä»¤äººéš¾å¿˜çš„è«è¿‡äºé‚£ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ªè¢«çŒå¥‡çš„å¼‚å½¢å“å¾—è‚¾è™šçš„ç«¥å¹´é˜´å½±ã€‚ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½1ã€‹å‡­å€Ÿå¼€åˆ›æ€§çš„æ¼”å‡ºæ–¹å¼å’Œæ¸¸æˆæ€§å½±å“äº†FPSä¹ƒè‡³æ•´ä¸ªæ¸¸æˆç•Œçš„å‘å±•ï¼Œç©å®¶ä»¬ä¹æ­¤ä¸ç–²åœ°ä¸€ééé€šå…³ï¼Œå¹¶æ¬²æ±‚ä¸æ»¡åœ°å¤§å£°å“­è¯‰è¦æ±‚Vç¤¾å¸¦æ¥æ›´å¤šè¿™æ ·çš„æ¸¸æˆã€‚è€Œä¸€å¹´åçš„1999å¹´ï¼Œä»–ä»¬çš„æ„¿æœ›å°±å®ç°äº†ã€‚
ã€Šé’ˆé”‹ç›¸å¯¹ã€‹æ˜¯ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½1ã€‹çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªDLCï¼Œå‘å”®äº1999å¹´ï¼Œåˆ¶ä½œç»„å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯Vç¤¾ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ã€Šæ— ä¸»ä¹‹åœ°ã€‹ç³»åˆ—çš„å¼€å‘å•†Gearboxã€‚æœ¬ä½œå¯ä»¥è¯´æ˜¯å‡ºé“å³å·…å³°ï¼Œã€Šé’ˆé”‹ç›¸å¯¹ã€‹è‡³ä»Šéƒ½è¢«å…¬è®¤ä¸ºæœ€æ£’çš„ä¸€éƒ¨DLCã€‚å¦‚åŒæ ‡é¢˜ï¼Œåœ¨æœ¬ä½œä¸­æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰®æ¼”çš„å°±æ˜¯ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½1ã€‹ä¸­çš„æ•Œå¯¹åŠ¿åŠ›ï¼šä¸€åå«é˜¿å¾·é‡Œå®‰Â·è°¢æ³¼å¾·çš„é™†æˆ˜é˜Ÿå‘˜ï¼Œ22å²ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸‹å£«ã€‚è™½ç„¶åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶é—´å’Œåœ°ç‚¹ï¼Œä½†åœ¨æœ¬ä½œä¸­æˆ‘ä»¬å°†ä¼šä»¥ä¸åŒçš„è§†è§’æ¥è§è¯é»‘å±±äº‹ä»¶ã€‚
æœ¬ä½œçš„è®­ç»ƒå…³å¯ä»¥è¯´æ˜¯æ¯”åŸç‰ˆçš„ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½ã€‹æœ‰è¶£å¾—å¤šï¼Œä½ ç«™åœ¨å®¿èˆé‡Œå¬æ•™å®˜æŒ¨ä¸ªè®­è¯ï¼Œç¬é—´å°±è®©äººæƒ³èµ·ã€Šå…¨é‡‘å±å¤–å£³ã€‹ä¸­çš„ååœºé¢ã€‚ç„¶åä½ åœ¨è®­ç»ƒåœºä¸­ä¸æ–­å­¦ä¹ å„ç§åŸºç¡€æ“ä½œå’Œæ¸¸æˆæœºåˆ¶ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æ“ä½œç”µå°ã€çˆ¬ç»³å­ç­‰ï¼Œåœ¨ä½ è®­ç»ƒæ—¶æ•™å®˜ä¼šä¸€ç›´åœ¨ä½ èº«è¾¹å¤§å¼å¤§å«ã€‚è€Œä¸”å¾ˆå¤šè®­ç»ƒåœºåœ°éƒ½æ˜¯åœ¨å¼€é˜”çš„å®¤å¤–ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›¸æ¯”äºã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½1ã€‹çš„è®­ç»ƒå…³ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå†›è¥è®©äººæ„Ÿè§‰æ›´åŠ ç”Ÿæœºå‹ƒå‹ƒã€‚
è¿›å…¥æ¸¸æˆåï¼Œä¸»è§’ä¹˜åçš„è¿è¾“æœºé‡è¢­åå æ¯ã€‚å½“ä½ é†’æ¥åä½ å‘ç°è‡ªå·±ä½äºé»‘å±±åŸºåœ°çš„ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ»åŠ¡å®¤å†…ï¼Œä½ å¹¶æœªæ”¶åˆ°æ€æ­»æˆˆç™»Â·å¼—é‡Œæ›¼å’Œå…¶ä»–ç§‘å­¦å®¶çš„å‘½ä»¤ï¼Œè€Œå½“ä½ å’Œæ€»éƒ¨å–å¾—è”ç³»åä»–ä»¬ä¹Ÿåªæ˜¯è®©ä½ èµ¶å¿«æ’¤ç¦»ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä½ æ‰®æ¼”çš„å¹¶éçœŸæ­£æ„ä¹‰ä¸Šçš„åæ´¾ã€‚ä½ è¿˜ä¼šçœ‹è§ç§‘å­¦å®¶ä»¬ä¹Ÿåœ¨æ•‘åŠ©å…¶ä»–å—ä¼¤çš„é™†æˆ˜é˜Ÿå‘˜ï¼Œå› ä¸ºä»–ä»¬ä¹Ÿä¸çŸ¥é“ä½ å…¶å®æ˜¯æ¥ç­å£çš„ï¼Œå½“ç„¶å¦‚æœä½ æ„¿æ„çš„è¯ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åƒä¸ªç–¯å­ä¸€æ ·æ•´æ­»è·¯ä¸Šé‡åˆ°çš„æ‰€æœ‰äººï¼Œåæ­£ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½1ã€‹çš„ä¸€å¤§ä¹è¶£å°±æ˜¯å¦‚æ­¤ã€‚
æœ¬ä½œä¸­çš„æ­¦å™¨åŸºæœ¬ä¸å˜ï¼Œæ–°æ­¦å™¨åŒ…æ‹¬ä¸€æŠŠæ²™é¹°ï¼Œç®—æ˜¯å–ä»£äº†ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½1ã€‹ä¸­çš„å·¦è½®æ‰‹æªçš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œä½†ç”±äºä½ è·å¾—å®ƒçš„æ—¶é—´æ¯”è¾ƒæ—©ï¼Œè€Œä¸”å­å¼¹è¡¥ç»™ä¹Ÿéå¸¸å¤šï¼Œç‰¹åˆ«æ˜¯è¿˜æœ‰æ¿€å…‰ç„å‡†ï¼Œä¸ªäººè®¤ä¸ºæ¯”å·¦è½®æ‰‹æªå¥½å¾ˆå¤šï¼›ä¼ é€æªï¼Œä¸€å‘å°±èƒ½æŠŠå¼‚å½¢é€å›è€å®¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œæ˜¯åŠæ¡å‘½ç‰ˆçš„BFGï¼›M249è½»æœºæªï¼Œä¼¤å®³éå¸¸å¤¸å¼ ï¼Œä½†å¼¹è¯æ¯”è¾ƒç¨€å°‘ï¼Œè€Œä¸”å®¹é‡åªæœ‰50å‘ã€‚é™¤æ­¤ä¹‹å¤–ä½ è¿˜ä¼šè·å¾—ä¸å°‘å¤–æ˜Ÿæ­¦å™¨ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ç”µèšæªï¼Œç±»ä¼¼äºèœ‚å·¢æªï¼Œå¼¹è¯æ— é™ä½†æœ‰å†·å´æ—¶é—´ï¼Œè€Œä¸”ä¼¤å®³å’Œç²¾åº¦éƒ½å¾ˆä¸é”™ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å®ƒä¸ä»…æ˜¯å¼¹è¯è€—å°½åçš„æ›¿ä»£å“ï¼ˆæ°´ä¸­æ…ç”¨ï¼‰ï¼›è—¤å£¶ï¼Œç›¸ä¿¡å¾ˆå¤šç©å®¶éƒ½æ¯”è¾ƒç†Ÿæ‚‰ï¼Œä½†æœ¬ä½œä¸­ä½ å¯ä»¥æŠŠå®ƒæ‹¿åœ¨æ‰‹ä¸Šï¼Œå®ƒå®é™…ä¸Šæ›´åƒæ˜¯ä¸€ç§é“å…·ï¼ŒåŠŸèƒ½ç±»ä¼¼äºç»³é’©æªï¼›å­¢å­è™«ï¼Œæœ€æœ‰è¶£çš„ä¸€æŠŠæ­¦å™¨ï¼Œæ™®é€šæ•Œäººè¢«æ‰“ä¸­ç›´æ¥çˆ†æˆè¡€å—ï¼Œè€Œæ¢å¼¹åŠ¨ä½œæ˜¯ç»™å®ƒå–‚å­¢å­ï¼Œè®©å®ƒçœ‹èµ·æ¥æ›´åƒæ˜¯ä¸€åªå® ç‰©ã€‚æ€»ä¹‹åœ¨æµç¨‹ä¸­ä¸åœåœ°è·å¾—æ–°æ­¦å™¨å¯ä»¥è®©ç©å®¶ä¿æŒä¸€ç§æ–°é²œæ„Ÿï¼Œä¹Ÿç»™äº†ç©å®¶ç»§ç»­ç©ä¸‹å»çš„åŠ¨åŠ›ï¼Œè€Œè¿™äº›æ–°çš„æ­¦å™¨ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†å¯¹ä»˜æ–°çš„æ•Œäººã€‚
åœ¨ã€Šé’ˆé”‹ç›¸å¯¹ã€‹ä¸­ï¼Œäººç±»æ•Œäººè¢«æ¢æˆäº†é»‘è¡£ç‰¹å·¥ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬åŸç‰ˆä¸­çš„é»‘è¡£å¥³åˆºå®¢ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¯•ç«Ÿå¦‚æœç¼ºå°‘äººç±»æ•Œäººæ€»ä¼šè®©äººæ„Ÿè§‰å°‘äº†äº›ä»€ä¹ˆã€‚å¾ˆå¤šäººç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡ç©ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½ã€‹å°±æ„Ÿè§‰å¥³åˆºå®¢å’ŒHECUæ˜¯ä¸€ä¼™çš„ï¼ˆè™½ç„¶Vç¤¾å¯èƒ½å‹æ ¹æ²¡æœ‰æƒ³è®©ä»–ä»¬ä¸€èµ·ç™»åœºï¼‰ï¼Œä½†ä»ã€Šé’ˆé”‹ç›¸å¯¹ã€‹ä¸­æ¥çœ‹æ˜æ˜¾ä¸æ˜¯â€”â€”ä»–ä»¬å…¶å®æ˜¯æ”¿åºœæ´¾æ¥çš„ç‰¹å·¥ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯æ¶ˆç­ä¸€åˆ‡ç”Ÿå‘½ä½“å¹¶ä»¥å°å‹æ ¸å¼¹æ‘§æ¯é»‘å±±åŸºåœ°ã€‚é™¤äº†é»‘è¡£äººä»¥å¤–ï¼Œã€Šé’ˆé”‹ç›¸å¯¹ã€‹ä¸­è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å¤–æ˜ŸåŠ¿åŠ›â€”â€”Xæ—ï¼Œä»–ä»¬å¹¶ä¸æ¥è‡ªXenï¼Œåªæ˜¯è¶Xenä¸åœ°çƒçš„ä¼ é€é—¨å¼€å¯æ—¶æ¥åˆ°äº†é»‘å±±ï¼Œè™½ç„¶ä»–ä»¬çš„è¡Œä¸ºå’Œæ”»å‡»æ¨¡å¼æ²¡æœ‰å˜åŒ–ï¼Œä½†è¿™äº›æ–°å‹å¤–æ˜Ÿç”Ÿç‰©çš„ç™»åœºè¿˜æ˜¯è®©äººè€³ç›®ä¸€æ–°ã€‚
åœ¨æµç¨‹æ–¹é¢ï¼ŒNPCé˜Ÿå‹ä¹Ÿæ˜¯æœ¬ä½œæœ€å¤§çš„äº®ç‚¹ä¹‹ä¸€ã€‚åœ¨æ¸¸æˆä¸­ä½ ç»å¸¸ä¼šé‡åˆ°å¾ˆå¤šè½å•çš„é™†æˆ˜é˜Ÿå‘˜ï¼ŒåŒ»ç–—å…µå¯ä»¥å¸®ä½ å’Œå…¶ä»–é˜Ÿå‹åŠ è¡€ï¼Œå·¥ç¨‹å…µåˆ™å¯ä»¥å¸®ä½ å¼€é—¨ã€‚ä¸è¿‡åœ¨ä¸€äº›é«˜å¼ºåº¦æˆ˜æ–—ä¸­ï¼Œä»–ä»¬ä¹Ÿèƒ½å‘æŒ¥ä¸å°çš„ä½œç”¨ï¼Œé—æ†¾çš„æ˜¯ä»–ä»¬ä¸ä»…æ­»å¾—å¿«ï¼Œè€Œä¸”å…¶ç•¥æ˜¾å¼±æ™ºçš„AIä¹Ÿè¶³å¤Ÿèƒ½æŠŠä½ æ°”å‡ºå†…ä¼¤ï¼šä½ ç»å¸¸è·‘ç€è·‘ç€å›å¤´ä¸€çœ‹å‘ç°ä»–ä»¬æ²¡å½±äº†ï¼Œç”šè‡³åœ¨äº¤ç«ä¸­ä¼šä¸»åŠ¨å†²åˆ°ä½ çš„æªå‰ã€‚ä¸è¿‡ä»–ä»¬è·Ÿç€ä½ çš„é‚£æ®µæ—¶é—´ç¡®å®èƒ½è®©æµç¨‹å°‘ä¸€äº›å­¤ç‹¬æ„Ÿï¼Œè€Œä¸”è¿™äº›é˜Ÿå‹çš„é…éŸ³ä¹Ÿæ¯”è¾ƒä¼˜ç§€ï¼Œæ˜¾å¾—æ¯”é»‘å±±çš„ç§‘å­¦å®¶å’Œä¿å®‰ä»¬æ›´å…·æœ‰ä¸ªæ€§ï¼Œè®©ä½ è§åˆ°ä»–ä»¬æ—¶å€æ„Ÿäº²åˆ‡ã€‚
æ€»è€Œè¨€ä¹‹ï¼Œã€Šé’ˆé”‹ç›¸å¯¹ã€‹åœ¨æ¸¸æˆæµç¨‹å¤§ä½“ä¸Šæ²¡æœ‰æ”¹å˜ï¼Œä½†å®ƒåœ¨åŸç‰ˆçš„å…³å¡è®¾è®¡ä¸Šå–å…¶ç²¾åï¼Œç”¨æ›´åŠ æœ‰è¶£çš„æ–¹å¼å°†ä¼˜ç§€çš„å†…å®¹å±•ç°ç»™ç©å®¶ã€‚æ¸¸æˆä¸­æœ‰å¾ˆå¤šå…³å¡éƒ½ç»™ä½ ä¸€ç§æ—¢è§†æ„Ÿï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚é‚£ä¸ªå·¨å¤§è •è™«çš„BOSSæˆ˜ï¼Œä¸åŸç‰ˆçš„è§¦æ‰‹å‡ ä¹ç›¸å·®æ— å‡ ï¼Œåªä¸è¿‡æ ¼å±€æ›´å°ã€èŠ‚å¥æ›´å¿«ã€‚è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€äº›Xençš„è·³å°å…³å¡ï¼Œä¸è¿‡ä»…ä»…å äº†å¾ˆå°ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œè€Œä¸”å¾ˆå¿«å°±ç»“æŸäº†ã€‚æ•´ä¸ªæ¸¸æˆå°±åƒæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´åŠ ç´§å‡‘çš„ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½1ã€‹ä½“éªŒï¼Œä»æ¡èµ·æ‰³æ‰‹åˆ°å¹²æ‰æœ€ç»ˆBOSSï¼Œè¿™å››äº”ä¸ªå°æ—¶çš„æµç¨‹ä¸­å‡ ä¹æ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•æ‹–æ³¥å¸¦æ°´å’Œæ¯ç‡¥ä¹å‘³çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œè¿™å°±æ˜¯ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆã€Šé’ˆé”‹ç›¸å¯¹ã€‹è¢«è®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½ã€‹ç³»åˆ—ä¸­æœ€æ£’çš„DLCï¼Œå®ƒä¸ä»…å®Œç¾å¤åˆ»äº†ã€ŠåŠæ¡å‘½1ã€‹çš„æˆåŠŸï¼Œå¹¶åŠ å…¥äº†æ–°çš„å†…å®¹æ‹“å±•ä¸–ç•Œè§‚ã€‚ä½†å¯æƒœçš„æ˜¯è¿™éƒ¨DLCçš„å‰§æƒ…è²Œä¼¼ä¸€ç›´æ²¡æœ‰è¢«é‡‡çº³ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´å®ƒçš„åœ°ä½å‡ ä¹ç›¸å½“äºä¸€éƒ¨å®˜æ–¹æˆæƒçš„åŒäººï¼Œè¿™ä¹Ÿè®©å¾ˆå¤šç²‰ä¸æ„Ÿåˆ°å¤±æœ›ï¼Œæ¯•ç«Ÿæ¸¸æˆç»“å°¾ç•™ä¸‹äº†ä¸€ä¸ªä¼ç¬”ï¼Œæš—ç¤ºè°¢æ³¼å¾·æˆä¸ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªå…³é”®äººç‰©ï¼Œå¤§å®¶éƒ½æƒ³çŸ¥é“ä»–ä¹‹åçš„æ•…äº‹ï¼Œä¸è¿‡å¯æƒœçš„æ˜¯ã€Šé’ˆé”‹ç›¸å¯¹ã€‹çš„ç»­ä½œä¼°è®¡å†ä¹Ÿç­‰ä¸åˆ°äº†ã€‚

Half-Life: Opposing Force

Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 13 juillet 2023
As a zoomer who is pretty new to the Half-Life franchise, I can say that this game has aged quite well. Between the visual storytelling, critical thinking to solve puzzles and proceed through a chapter, and fun gameplay, Half-Life: Opposing Force is truly a good game. The ending is dark as hell too.

RecommandÃ©
504.7 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 5 dÃ©cembre 2017
Half-Life: Opposing Force

This is the best add on to Half-Life in my opinion. There are new weapons and not a single crowbar. You can also create a time paradox. Race X creatures are really good enemies and the gene worm is a lot more threatening than a gargantua and a PCV suit instead of an HEV suit or an armour vest. You get to interact with other soldiers and maybe even create a small group. I really have nothing negative to say about this, everything works well. Get this if you like Half-Life series!

Grade: 10/10

RecommandÃ©
43.5 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 14 juin 2022
You essentially play in the same story and timeline of the events in Half Life, but seen from the eyes of a soldier that was sent in to "clean up" the mess, the antagonist if you will. If you enjoyed playing Half Life even just a little bit, then this one is absolutely necessary for your collection.

* A lot of new guns
* A lot of new enemys
* Challenging enemies (if you play on hard)
* You see Freeman jumping on the portal to Xen (LUL)

â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥: I don't know if it's a â™¥â™¥â™¥, considering that the game is from 1999 but...

14 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
3 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation amusante
0
RecommandÃ©
3.4 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 29 novembre 2019
Significantly more entertaining than the base game:

- Fewer platforming sections
- Fewer scripted sequences
- Less obnoxious level design
- Fewer bullet spongy enemies thanks to...
- ...more powerful weapons: the new alien weapons are actually useful (especially the Spore Launcher) and the "normal" weapons tear sh*t up (<3 M249 <3)
- ...and new enemies: they are less bullet spongy overall (and those that are, are fewer in number), but deal more damage instead
- Higher difficulty due to the above
- Minimal number of Xen sections

While it still has close to no atmosphere like the base game, at least it's more fun by a large degree. Very short, though.
 
December Man

Half-Life: Opposing Force Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ°Ğ´Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğº HL, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¾Ñ‡ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³ÑƒÑ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ñƒ Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ğ´ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ·Ğ° ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ½Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ†Ğ° Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ°, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ²ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¤Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ°.

ĞÑ‚Ğ´ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ³ĞµĞ¹Ğ¼-Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ², ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑŒ Ğ½Ğ° ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ²Ñƒ. Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 4 janvier 2015
Opposing Force was Gearbox's first game and they did not disappoint back then. As the first of two Half-Life expansions Opposing Force put you in the shoes of a military character sent in to take out Gordon Freeman. Same quality as the original Half-Life and another great storyline addition to the Half-Life world. This is what all expansions of games should look like.

Half Life: Opposing Force is one of the best expansions i've ever played and easily ranks right alongside Half Life 1 and Halflife 2 as one of the best first person shooters made. Gameplay and story plus the addition of new monsters and weapons make this an absolutely incredible, must play experience. Graphics are long past prime, but you won't notice. The action draws you in and dosen't let go until the credits roll. 10/10

RecommandÃ©
3.2 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 12 aout 2015
This is actually my first time playing opposing force even though i have gone though the regular half life 1 and 2 many times. It's suprisingly short.. probably half as long as half life 1.

The graphics and puzzle are just about the same difficulty but jumps are little bit harder.

It's much easier to die in earlly game from the envirment hazards and late game became black OPs.

Overall it's a nice little addition to the original half life 1.

8.5/10.

IF you have missed this one like me.. spend some time to try it. It's not long but it's still quite fun like regular half life. only took me 3.2 hours to finish.

RecommandÃ©
9.0 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 7 septembre 2018
Easily considered the best DLC ever for one of the greatest games ever. Opposing Force took the success of Half Life and vastly improved on it. The addition of the new alien species Race X and the Black Ops cleaning up the mess of the other soldiers was a great addition to the game. The new weapons are great. For the most part the game is quite enjoyable there are parts that can be frustrating at times other than that its replay value is very high. The multiplayer is also good if you can find a lobby. Highly suggest checking out.

RecommandÃ©
11.4 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 29 mai 2021
It's not my favourite Half-Life game but it's sure as hell a contender. My God is this a beautiful game. Its graphics may not have aged well but that's beside the point because it's Story, Enemies and Gameplay aged like a fine wine. While it lacks the lovable characters and music of Half-Life 2 Episode 2, it equal in every other right. New enemies, New Scenarios, New Characters and of course the Gman. Without Spoiling anything its main character Shepard is my preferred protagonist over Freeman as he wields a more powerful Wrench and dawns a green armour and mask. His story is excellent and although short is damn well worth the $4.99 price tag. Buy this game, I guarantee you'll enjoy it if FPSs are your cup of tea.

Es un juego mÃ¡s directo que el propio Half Life entre otros motivos por ser mucho mÃ¡s corto, la historia la van narrando los personajes que nos encontramos por el camino y nosotros solo debemos centrarnos en abrirnos paso y disparar, aunque habrÃ¡ pequeÃ±os puzzles muy sencillos siendo lo mÃ¡s habitual un botÃ³n o rejilla escondido en la sala. GrÃ¡ficamente se siente muy anticuado y no serÃ¡ extraÃ±o ver objetos que se traban â™¥â™¥â™¥ otros, desaparecen, etc, siendo lo mÃ¡s molesto una ocasiÃ³n donde debÃ­a acompaÃ±ar a un cientÃ­fico para que abriese una puerta pero este se quedÃ³ atascado en una puerta anterior, obligÃ¡ndome a cargar la partida mÃ¡s atrÃ¡s y repetir todo. Es un juego muy bueno, entretiene de principio a fin, pero hoy en dÃ­a hay que aceptar sus limitaciones tÃ©cnicas si queremos disfrutarlo.

RecommandÃ©
26.2 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 11 fÃ©vrier 2017
Not good at writing reviews but I'll try my best to cover everything :)
But before we continue I advise you to play the original Half-Life (Read my review for Half-Life Here )



Review
Half-Life: Opposing Force (HL:OF) is an expansion pack for Valve's FPS game Half-Life The Gameplay doesn't differ much from the original game
You play the role of Cpl.Shepherd a HECU Marine/Grunt,the game takes place in the same universe as the original Half-Life your obejctive is to evacuate the scientists trapped inside black mesa and also to capture and kill Gordon Freeman but things change quickly as you encounter aliens and the commando group affiliated with US government known as the Black Ops . I don't want to spoil the story anymore play this game and discover for yourself ;)

Let's jump to pros and â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥

Pros:
+Extremely Challenging
+Hard to beat the enemies (even on easy difficulty)
+Variety of weapons (About 14-15)
+Amazing Graphics (For a video game that was developed in 1999)
+Nice Gameplay
+The game is challenging you won't be able to beat this game easily in Short It's not your average run and shoot game instead of hunting down waves after waves of enemies there are a lot of puzzles in the game you have to solve in order to proceed to next level only intelligent people are able to do so (Seriously)
+Great soundtracks
+Physics is perfect (almost)
+Maps are very detailed (for a game developed in GoldSrc Engine)
+Variety of weapons (about 13-15)
+Hard to beat enemies
+Great Environment (The feeling of being alone and surrounded by enemies from all sides)
+Mod Support

â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥:
-Extremely Buggy (It was difficult to complete the game I had to keep loading the same save file over and over again at some levels for example:-sometimes a door won't open,npcs wont respond,buttons wont work but loading the save file again would solve the problem xD)
-Multiplayer is ALMOST dead
-A VERY SHORT story

Overall Rating:-7.5/10
Although I did enjoy this game but due its short story I recommend you to buy it during the sale it doesn't deserve $5
 
B L Î» C K F L Î» M E

marcus
0
13 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
0
RecommandÃ©
71.7 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 24 dÃ©cembre 2016
I was just looking through my games list, and the reviews I've done for games, and realized I left out some important ones. I'm in a bit of a chatty mood, so let's do a few, shall we?

HL:OpFor is an expantion pack for Half Life. It was sold along with Blue Shift back when CDs were still a thing. I bought it WAY back when.

Opposing Force puts you into the character of Colonel Sheppard, one of the many Special Forces guys running around in Half Life. Some have argued whether or not Opposing Force(and, by extention, Blue Shift) are "Half Life Canon"... I would say that they are, as they add to the story of Half Life without conflicting with it. The fact that you see Gordon Freeman for a moment puts you right into the original story, even if you're technically walking along side of it.

There isn't much in the way of "new content", but what IS there, works well within the Half Life universe. Your goal is to escape Black Mesa with your life intact, after you've been left behind.

While shorter than the original Half Life, it is still a lot of fun to play, even after several run throughs.
 
Iggy Stardust

Mr K. 9558
0
8 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
1 personne a trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation amusante
0
RecommandÃ©
5.1 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 10 septembre 2016
Half-Life: Opposing Force is an expansion pack made by Gearbox. While you play as Gordon Freeman in the original game, this time around you take control of a marine called Adrian Shephard. Gearbox showed their creativity in this game and added a lot of weapons, new aliens, zombified marines, ropes and a glorious knife.

pros
++ It adds new things to the Half-Life universe
+ Nods to the first Half-Life game
+ Interesting puzzles
+ Good maps
+ Health packs
+ Many weapons to choose from

â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥
- Like its predecessor the final boss is bad.
- No subtitles and the voice acting is hit or miss
- Dumb friendly AI
- dated weapon sounds

Verdict
I'd recommend buying Opposing Force if you liked playing Half-Life 1 and want to see the Black Mesa Incident from a marine's point of view.

Replay value: Average
Rating: 8.0/10
Recommendation: Yes
 
Syfy
0
12 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
1 personne a trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation amusante
0
RecommandÃ©
8.0 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 15 octobre 2014
As someone loving a good setting and a great story with room for theories and mystery, this game gives me everything I could ask for.
If you love or even like Half Life, play this game!
It enhances the story for a big chunk.
This game is from 1999, so I won't even talk about graphics and stuff, you can imagine how it looks.

The only thing that bothers me is that you change weapon if you pick up the new one.
That killed me once as I got some Nades from a crate, but that is a little thing.
You can't change that in the options menu, if you know console commands feel free to change it, I don't know how.

Anyways, you should totally get this game.
I hate that I did not play it earlier.

8 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
0
RecommandÃ©
9.2 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 4 juillet 2021
This is, at its heart, a classic Half-Life game. A fun adventure with many frustrating points along the way. Enemies sponging up more munitions than a blast-proof wall, platforming with janky GoldSrc physics, dark tunnels with enemies around a corner you couldn't predict.. But it's the kind of frustration that makes you determined to kick the game's ass and see it through to the end. Plus, its narrative is very interesting, and the primary reason I pushed through to the end. And you do feel fulfilled after overcoming it.

If you're not a fan of the "Where the â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥ do I go now" kind of game, and felt annoyed at the other Half-Life titles, this one is noticeably more linear, which is something I kind of enjoyed. But do go into it with the knowledge that it's.. rather flawed.
 
Stray (She/Her)
150 produits enregistrÃ©s
0
9 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
0
RecommandÃ©
5.9 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 28 novembre 2019
If you played the original Half-Life, you would really enjoy Opposing Force. An expansion for the already revolutionary Half-Life following a new protagonist, Adrian Shepherd. Opposing Force introduces new gameplay elements such as new weapons, a grappling hook, squad interactions which was later inplemented to Half-Life 2, etc. Story was a focus on the marines' perspective during the events of Half-Life. Also got more hints and story to the mysterious G-man in the last game. Definitely a must play if you enjoyed the original Half Life.

Some annoying issues with the game is the glitches, dated AI, and crashes, but we can all ignore that.

Thanks to Half-Life Opposing force, it helped kickstarted Gearbox Software that later gave us Borderlands Series but sadly, Borderlands and a few other titles were really excellent games and other titles such as Duke Nukem Forever, Aliens: Colonel Marines, Battleborn were quite crappy. Finally Valve is taking development to Half-Life: Alyx which hopefully would bring Half-Life series back from the dead, and hopefully we could see a future story with Adrian Shepherd.


Edit 18/05/2020
Valve released Half-Life:Alyx, if Half-Life 3 were to ever be released, Valve stated themselves they want it to revolutionize the video game industry so we all have to be patient.
 
Corgi in a cup
98 produits enregistrÃ©s

6 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
0
RecommandÃ©
4.8 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 25 janvier 2020
Sigue a "La Cruceta Inquieta", mentor de Steam
A diferencia de "Half-Life: Blue Shift", en "Half-Life: Opposing Force" tomaremos el papel del enemigo en el papel de un especialista militar y su equipo para dar caza a Gordon Freeman. En esta ocasiÃ³n, y a diferencia del primer contenido adicional, la variedad de situaciones, armas y enemigos nuevos es mucho mayor, lo que se traduce en una mayor capacidad de entretenimiento. Lo cierto es que, si "Blue Shift" no destacaba en exceso como producto independiente, considero que "Opposing Force" logra ser interesante y divertido como juego individual, incluso sin haber jugado al "Half-Life" original, aunque, por supuesto, es recomendable haberlo hecho.

"Half-Life: Opposing Force" logra ser una entretenida aventura/ shooter de marines que no necesariamente requiere de nosotros el haber jugado al juego base.

RecommandÃ©
13.6 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 4 juillet 2017
A great expansion pack to the main game . Worth playing even to this day ( same i say with goldeneye for n64) , very fun to witness the events from a different point of view. Just long enough. Just hard enough, great level design. Good weapon variety and enemy variety.
The only minor complaint is arguably the aiming. While the aiming works, sometimes the autoaim is a hindrance.
However a great fps game. And while fps isnt my fav genre , sometimes fps , especially when the fps is good and hard they tend to stick with me.

Opposing Force rundet das HalfLife Erlebnis ab, indem man neben der Geschichte um Freeman und Wachmann Barney in Blue Shift hier aus Sicht des Soldaten Sheppard die Geschehnisse erleben.

Spielerisch so wie die anderen Teile, Grafik und Sound ebenfalls. Einige neue Waffen sind enthalten.

Zwischendurch Ã¼berschneiden sich die Storylines oder man trifft bekannte Gesichter wie Forscher oder den GMan.

Auf jedenfall empfehlenswert.

Ğ¡Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ: Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‰Ğµ ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‡ĞµĞ¼ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ°Ñ Ñ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑŒ

Ğ“Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ² ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ· ĞĞ´Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´, ĞºĞ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ» Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ HECU, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ¾ Ğ² Black Mesa ÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°. ĞĞ° ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ· ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ñ, Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ÑŒÑˆĞµ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾. ĞÑ‚ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°ĞµÑˆÑŒ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ.

Ğ§Ñ‚Ğ¾ ĞºĞ°ÑĞ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ²Ñ€Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ², Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ĞºĞ½ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ—ĞµĞ½Ğ°, Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑÑ Ñ ÑĞ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ñ‡ÑƒĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‰Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ "Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑ‹ Ğ¥", Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ñ Ñ‡ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸. Kind of disappointed with Black Mesa recently so I gave this a try turned out to be the best 4 hours I ever had, might say this is somewhat better than the original Half-Life but shorter. All the newly added weapons are fantastic and one of them even came with new grappling mechanic(and you can also climb rope in this game). New enemy type introduced really spice things up to choose different kind of attacking approach with each encounters. FINAL BOSS is really good. DO BUY IT!

La primera expansiÃ³n lanzada de ''Half Life'' te pone en el pellejo del cabo Shepard, quien tiene una misiÃ³n de limpieza en los laboratorios Black Mesa, es decir, eliminar a todo lo que se le ponga por delante, ya sean xenianos o humanos. Sin embargo su prioridad es eliminar al doctor Gordon Freeman, el protagonista del ''Half Life'' original. La expansiÃ³n es bastante interesante, ya que nos pone en la piel de los malos y muestra como se desarrollan los sucesos de Black Mesa desde un punto de vista alternativo al de Gordon. Realmente para mi es una actualizaciÃ³n muy bien hecha, no te revela cosas cruciales de la trama, simplemente te hace profundizar en la historia de Black Mesa. Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 31 dÃ©cembre 2019
This is the last good thing Randy Pitchford has been a part of. :)

All jokes aside, a masterful "DLC"/Expansion. They brought a lot of the good, and gave you some even cooler. The weapons are super fun, and seem like weapons that could have been in the original game. If you liked Half-Life 1, then I don't understand how you wouldn't like this.

Only thing I dislike is those stupid ropes...9.9/10 <3

Half-Life: Opposing Force is basicly about one of the grunts who were sent to the clean up project and he is imediatly thrown into the horrors of Black Mesa. but its got abit of stuff you are kinda misslead by. for example: he dosen't have to kill everyone. infact, he sorta needs them. its got good story and enviroment. speaking of which, you learn more stuff they were working on. its cool. and its only $4.99! buy it and its sure to meet your entertainment needs. it wont let you down sir or madam!

4.5 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 11 avril 2023
This is an excellent expansion. It adds many new features to the game and continues building on the plot in a such a way that skipping it doesnâ€™t hinder your understanding of the next entry.

The platoon mechanic is a neat idea, but a lot of its potential seems to be hindered by scripted events and navigational issues. Very rarely did a soldier follow me for more than a few corridors, let alone entire missions. I suppose I shouldnâ€™t be surprised, though. After all, the gameâ€™s a quarter-century old and was already pushing the boundaries of the genre as a whole. Still, it's a little disappointing. In similar respects, the rope is also a cool addition, albeit extremely buggy. The grappling hook is another great addition. I think what Iâ€™m most surprised by is the fact that the devs remembered to add segments involving these features all throughout the game.

The expansion does have a few issues, though. The night vision goggles are a cool alternative to the flashlight, but in just about every scenario, youâ€™ll end up turning it on for one short vent system, then turning it off again immediately after. The only time youâ€™ll ever use it for an extended period is during the chapter â€˜Foxtrot Uniformâ€™, which is where I feel the expansion starts showing a massive decline in quality. Much like the original game, the last few chapters are very poorly designed. What youâ€™ll find is essentially back-to-back gauntlets consisting of high-level enemies, all of which are severely lacking in ammo and even more so in health. It isnâ€™t fun in any way and I hope whoever was responsible for coming up with the idea was given a stern talking to and forced to undergo a comprehensive shortcourse on level design.

One thing Iâ€™m a little curious about is in regards to the Powered Combat Vest. The tutorial showcases four different charging methods for this item, but during the course of the game, I didnâ€™t find any commercial charging stations at all, and was only able to locate one military charging station. Maybe I didnâ€™t look hard enough, maybe they just forgot. Either way, thought it was worth jotting down.

Overall, pretty enjoyable experience. If you liked the original game, youâ€™ll probably like this one, too.

1
Non recommandÃ©
5.0 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 27 mai 2022
The game has a really nasty progression bug where you're locked out of continuing further.

In the level Vicarious Reality, you're apparently supposed to find and grab the Barnacle Grapple weapon. However, it is easily possible to beat the level without doing so. You can reach up to Foxtrot Uniform level, which is 2 levels after, and then you're stuck because it is impossible to jump to the platform above without having Barnacle Grapple. I reached this point without knowing about Barnacle Grapple existing, and had to look up walkthroughs to see how to proceed. Unfortunately, Barnacle Grapple is necessary and there is no path back to Vicarious Reality level.
 
xx2cd91xx2
2
8 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
0
RecommandÃ©
5.5 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 14 juillet 2022
Half Life: Opposing Force is the first expansion to Half Life, coming out about a year later. While not revolutionary in any sense compared to the the first title, it's still a darn good Half Life game that manages to pack a punch in such a short time. Instead of playing as Gordon Freeman, you are Corporal Shepard, a US Marine sent in to quell the Xen invasion and silence the cries of the SCIENCE TEAM. But before orders can be relayed, your helicopter is shot down leaving you to experience the chaos firsthand through the eyes of the marines. Other than shifting up the perspective and giving you a new campaign the game also adds new NPC's, but more importantly several new enemy and weapon types. The minor changes that this expansion adds give it enough spice to make it worth a purchase if you enjoyed Half Life 1. And the same kind of atmospheric storytelling present in the first game adds more to the value, especially for those who enjoy the lore. So if you're a fan of classic FPS games then you should definitely give this one a try.
 
Uman Bean

Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 11 dÃ©cembre 2013
This expansion to Half-Life is much longer than Blue Shift is and also, much harder to get through. There are times when you're going to get frustrated, but I still consider this a short and sweet package with the army flavor in it. Not to mention the training section of the game. That training section in the military barracks was amusing and also felt realistic. I totally recommend this game.
 
Pooka Mustardâ„¢

Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 7 juillet 2016
Half-Life: Opposing Force - Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¸ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑƒÑĞ¿ĞµÑˆĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ°Ğ´Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğº Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğµ.

Ğ•Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ Ğ² ĞºĞ¾ÑˆĞ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¾ÑˆĞµĞ´ÑˆĞ¸Ğµ Ğ² Ğ§Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞœĞµĞ·Ğµ, Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ»ÑÑÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ¼ Ğ²Ğ·Ğ³Ğ»ÑĞ½ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ° ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ÑƒĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ ÑƒĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¿ĞµÑ…Ğ° (Ğ²Ñ€Ğ°Ğ³Ğ° Ğ² Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸) - ĞĞ´Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ°.

ĞŸĞ¾ ĞºĞ°Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ñƒ - Ğ°Ğ´Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½ ÑƒÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ñƒ Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆÑŒ Ğ² Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸. ĞĞ´Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´ Ğ¼Ñ‹ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ¶Ğ´Ñ‘Ğ¼ Ğ² Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¼ Half-Life! ĞĞ´Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ²ÑĞµĞ³Ğ´Ğ°!
English version:
And this return of Half-life type of addition: Opposing Froce. Addition is remarkable:
1. New Guns.
2. New enemies.
3. The new main character - on it time we play for the corporal of marines Andrian Shepard!
4. A little tightened graphics.
5. The memorable plot.
6. An ending which sets you thinking for many years - what will be with Shepard?
And still there are many pluses. Published her Valve, and have developed Gearbox Software (my favourite studio). And it is the first game Gearbox Software, what everything at them has begun with. And a game has received many positive reviews. Gearbox Software has very good games.
Andrian Shepard we to you wait in new Half-Life! Adrian Shepard forever!
 
Marsik_Mirage

ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞµĞ»ÑŒÑ†Ñ‹ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ¼Ñƒ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ñ (Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¶Ğµ ĞĞ´Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´) ÑĞ²Ğ»ÑÑÑ‚ÑÑ "Ğ Ğ°ÑĞ¾Ğ¹ X" ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑÑ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ñƒ Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ ĞµĞ¼Ñƒ, Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ‘Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞšĞ°Ğ»Ñ…Ğ°ÑƒĞ½ Ğ¸ Ğ“Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¤Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ Ğ²Ğ¾ÑÑÑ‚ ÑĞ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞµĞ»ÑŒÑ†Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ²ÑĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ—ĞµĞ½Ğ°(Xen). Ğ¡Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ÑƒÑ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ° Normal, Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ° Hard ĞºĞ°Ğº Ñ. ĞÑ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ² Half-Life: Opposing Force: ĞĞ½Ğ¾ ĞĞ¥*Ğ˜Ğ¢Ğ•Ğ›Ğ¬ĞĞĞ•! Ğ˜Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‰Ğµ Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾-Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞµ Ğ¸ ĞºÑ€ÑƒÑ‡Ğµ, Ñ‡ĞµĞ¼ Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Half-Life. ĞĞµ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´Ñƒ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¼ Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ²ÑĞµ Ğ¿ÑƒÑˆĞºĞ¸ Ğ² HL:OF Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºÑƒ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğµ Ğ»ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµĞ¼ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞµ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ ÑƒĞ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±ÑƒĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ Ğ±Ñ‹ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ· Ğ² ÑĞ²Ğ¾ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‚ Gearbox (Ğ´Ğ°-Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚Ğµ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¿ÑƒĞ»ÑÑ€Ğ½Ñ‹ ÑĞ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ĞµĞ¼ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Borderlands). Ğ–Ğ´Ñƒ Remake Opposing Force ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ² Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ÑƒÑ‰ĞµĞ¼ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¶ĞµĞ½ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸. Ğ£Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‚ Blue Shift, Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğµ ÑƒĞ¶ Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºĞ¾Ğµ ĞºĞ°Ğº ĞºĞ°Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ. Ğ”Ğ»Ñ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞºĞ° Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸ HL:OF Ğ½ÑƒĞ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼ÑƒĞ¼ Ğ¼ĞµÑÑÑ†, Ğ²ĞµĞ´ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞºÑƒ Half-Life Ğ»ĞµĞ³ĞºĞ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ² Ñ‚ĞµÑ… Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ…. 10/10 So, Corporal Shephard we meet at last - G-Man.
 
Max

47.2 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 10 mai 2019
OpFor is probably the best expansion pack for any game ever...

The quality of content that Gearbox delivered here was just mind-blowing. A completely new story arch that rivals the original Half Life's story in terms of quality and which includes a new silent protagonist, Corporal Adrian Shephard.

Pro's:

* A great story that focuses on the angle of the Marines sent in to "clean up" the Black Mesa incident.
* Fantastic new weapon selection including the Deagle, Sniper Rifle and of course the Displacer Cannon (Telegun) to name a few.
* New and challenging enemies to wage battle against including the tactical Shock Troopers and the creepy Pit Drones.
* Top Notch level design showing off more of the Black Mesa facility.
* Decent Sound Effects

â™¥â™¥â™¥'s:

* Multiplayer lacks content and originality over the original Half-Life multiplayer modes.
* Music selection lacks quality.

It's really hard to think of anything else that's "wrong" with this expansion. Digging further would just be nitpicking.

All in all, this is a truly great game expansion pack that bleeds quality with every step.

Final thought: 'OORAH MARINES
 
FEROX
429 produits enregistrÃ©s
1
15 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
1 personne a trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation amusante
0
RecommandÃ©
0.1 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 30 septembre 2014
An excellent expansion pack from developer Gearbox! I wonder how many of us still know what expansions were... nowadays these extra stories would come in the form of DLCs not an expansion pack. It meant to indicate a longer story and this is definitely a bigger pack than a dlc which can be a single weapon or a new costume for a character in the game.

In any case, Opposing Force puts us in the shoes of a corporal, a certain Adrian Shepard, who - along with his fellow soldiers - is sent to neutralise the enemies invading the Black Mesa facility. As expected, things go awry and you are alone facing the good-old aliens. There is a new assortment of weapons, new enemies and new music. Oh, and there are fat security officers helping you!

By the way: the game comes with widescreen settings and vsync can be switched on! Just excellent!

A relatively long and challenging expansion pack that comes very cheap. It did age a lot throughout the 15 years but it is still a great game... at least for reminiscing purposes.
 
CorvusCorax
1,563 produits enregistrÃ©s
0

RecommandÃ©
6.4 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 6 dÃ©cembre 2023
Half-Life: Opposing Force is an interesting scenario where you play as... well the opposing force. You play as Adrian Shepard, a US Marine Corporal, who is part of the Black Mesa cleanup project.

It's an interesting game, expanding on the events of Half-Life showing you a different side. There's a time where you get to see Freeman himself! The gameplay is much the same, although you do play around with a bit different set of weapons. It also does feel a bit harder compared to Half-Life, but that might just be on my end.

Overall, a pleasant experience and great addition to the Half-Life series. And remember, Adrian Shepard is still in the floating Osprey in Stasis World

e6e

11 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
0
RecommandÃ©
6.0 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 30 juin 2022
Great expansion pack for a great game. Many people prefer Opposing Force to base Half-Life, and while I disagree I certainly see where they are coming from. Opposing Force does a great job separating itself while also retaining what made the original so great. Half-Life: Opposing Force is a classic and well worth its price all these years later.

PROS:
- Great level design that is more consistent than the original (no Xen)
- Retains most of the base game's weapons while introducing some interesting ones
- Great, if more straightforward storyline, when compared to the original
- Expectedly great performance
- Decent value for an expansion pack, taking ~ 5 hours on a first time playthrough

â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥:
- Some of the newer enemies are not the best
- Has clunky movement like the base game
 
JAC-MAT-HAG

Le jeu

Non, pas vraiment de rejouabilitÃ©, et aucun achievement.

Produit reÃ§u gratuitement

author a Ã©crit :
DiÄŸer oyunlar ile ilgili incelemelerime / indirim duyurularÄ±na ulaÅŸmak iÃ§in buraya tÄ±klayÄ±n.

Half Life Ä±n bir diÄŸer DLC si diyebileceÄŸimiz Opposing Force'da Gordon'u ortadan kaldÄ±rmak iÃ§in Black Mesa'ya gelen askerlerden birisini oynadÄ±ÄŸÄ±mÄ±z bir oyun.

Askerlere bilim adamlarÄ±nÄ± kurtarmaya gidiyoruz deniliyor ve bu amaÃ§la yola Ã§Ä±kÄ±yoruz, yolda helikopterimiz saldÄ±rÄ±ya uÄŸrayÄ±p Ã§avuÅŸ Ã¶ldÃ¼kten sonra aslÄ±nda gerÃ§ek amacÄ±mÄ±zÄ±n Black Mesa'yÄ± temizlemek olduÄŸunu Ã¶ÄŸrenemiyoruz. Bu nedenle karakterimiz oyundaki askerlerin bilim adamlarÄ±nÄ± Ã¶ldÃ¼rdÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼nÃ¼ gÃ¶rdÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼nde Ã§ok ÅŸaÅŸÄ±rÄ±yor.

Oyunda ilk defa Half Life iÃ§in yeni silahlar ve yeni dÃ¼ÅŸman tipleri geliyor. SilahlarÄ± ve dÃ¼ÅŸmanlarÄ± ilk gÃ¶rdÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼nÃ¼zde Ã§ok ÅŸaÅŸÄ±rabilirsiniz. Oyuna Ã§ok gÃ¼zel yedirilmiÅŸ.

YaklaÅŸÄ±k 4 saat sÃ¼ren bu oyun ile Black Mesa'yÄ± bir kez daha ziyaret etmeyi ihmal etmeyin.

Ulan Gaben nerde HL3!!
 
Kaldorein
1,185 produits enregistrÃ©s

27 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile
2 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation amusante
0
RecommandÃ©
4.9 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 4 aout 2015
Half Life: Opposing Force is the final expansion pack for the original Half Life but is it worth your time ?

Half Life: Opposing Force puts you in the shoes of Corporal Adrian Shepard who is sent into Black Mesa to kill Gordon Freeman and you get to experience the invasion through his eyes.

Gameplay is the same as Half Life and Half Life Blue Shift but it adds new stuff to it. You can use the barnacle monster to swing around the environment. Overall apart from that new mechanic and new weapons like the teleportation gun that sends you to a location with ammo, armor and health pick ups.

The soundtrack is awesome as always. There are intense music during some of the later firefights and it's awesome. The audio for the bad guys isn't that good but that's too the age of the game. But the music overall is really good.

This expansion is really hard even on the normal difficulty. You will have to take things slowly, if you move too fast you will die cause some of levels are insanely hard.

Level Design for the most part is alright, there's less of thinking where to go, but it still has many places to explore to find secret stashes of ammo and health pick ups. But some of the levels have very claustrophobic environments that could confuse some players.

Half Life Opposing Force took me 5 hours to finish. It's quite short and it's doesn't have much replay value apart from the first playthrough where you will see everything there is to see.

The game has a few minor bugs like the enemy AI glitching through walls but overall it doesn't happen too often and there aren't any game breaking bugs that I could find.

Overall this is a very good expansion pack compared to Blue Shift. It's longer, adds more stuff and has a better story. Overall If you want the complete Half Life experience than by all means check out Blue Shift and Opposing Force. But if you have to choose one then by all means buy Opposing Force. I give Half Life: Opposing Force an 8/10

For more reviews follow Snort's Review curator page here - follow for regular updates on reviews for other games!
 
Snort Cannon

Half-Life: Opposing Force.

Ğ’Ñ‹Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‰ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ°Ñ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¸ÑÑ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğµ Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¸ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ±Ğ¾ĞµĞ²Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ², Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° Ğ½ĞµÑ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞµ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ½ĞµÑÑ‘Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ² Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½ÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞºÑ "Ğ¢ÑƒĞ¼Ğ°Ğ½" Ğ¡Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ° ĞšĞ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°, ÑĞ¼ĞµÑˆĞ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ "Ğ§ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸" Ğ¸ "ĞšÑƒĞºĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸", Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ…Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ¸ĞºÑƒ Ğ¼ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ±Ğ»ÑƒĞ¶Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ·Ğ²ÑƒĞº ÑĞ¾Ğ±ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ÑˆĞ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ. ĞšĞ¾Ğ½Ñ†ĞµĞ¿Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ° Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ°, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ñ‹ Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğµ (Ğ³ĞµĞ¾Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ñ„Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸), Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¶ĞµĞ¼. ĞĞ° ÑĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñƒ Ğ¸ÑĞºÑƒÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ² Ğ²Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞºĞ°Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºÑƒ Ğ“Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½Ñƒ Ğ¤Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñƒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆÑ‘Ğ» Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹, ĞĞ´Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´. ĞŸĞ¾Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğ¾, ÑĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ±Ğ¾ĞµĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ†ĞµĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ÑÑŒ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‰ĞµĞ¼ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ñ‹. Ğ•ÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ“Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ±ĞµĞ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‡ÑŒ, Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´ Ğ¸Ğ· ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ "Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‡ÑŒ" Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ ÑˆĞ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ² Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ»Ğ° Ñ Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ²ĞµÑ. Ğ•ÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ»ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ñ ĞºĞ¸Ğ½ĞµĞ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ñ„Ğ¾Ğ¼, Ñ‚Ğ¾ ÑÑ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñƒ Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ½Ğ° ÑƒĞ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´ÑƒÑ‚ "Ğ§ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¾Ğ¹" Ğ¸ "Ğ§ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ğµ", ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ, Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ÑÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ°. Ğ˜Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€ĞµÑĞµĞ½ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ñ„Ğ°ĞºÑ‚, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ñƒ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ğ·Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ°Ğ±Ñ‹ ĞºĞ°ĞºĞ¾Ğµ - Ğ° ÑƒĞ±Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ° Ğ¤Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ°, Ñ‚Ğ¾ ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ğ·Ğ° ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ñ‹ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ² Half Life. ĞÑ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ°Ñ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ´ÑƒĞ¼ĞºĞ°, Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‰Ğ°Ñ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ° Ğ·Ğ° Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ, Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ñƒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ»Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ "Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºĞ° Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¶ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°" Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞºÑĞµ Ğ§Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ½Ğ°Ñ ĞœĞµĞ·Ğ° (Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¸Ğ¸) Ğ½Ğµ ÑƒĞ´Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑÑ - Ğ“Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½ ÑƒĞ´Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ² Ñ‡ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ¼. Ğ”Ğ°, ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚, Ğ½Ğ°Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ, Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ²ĞºÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ†Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ñ‚ÑŒ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‰Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑÑ Ğ² ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ½Ğ°Ñ… ĞœĞµĞ·Ñ‹ Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¸Ñ…, Ğ·Ğ°ÑĞºĞ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ² Ğ½Ğ° ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ³ Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½ÑƒÑ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ñƒ. Ğ˜Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº, Ğ² Ğ¸ÑÑĞ»ĞµĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¼ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞºÑĞµ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ´ĞµĞ½ÑŒĞ³Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑ‰Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ² Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‚ ÑĞºÑĞ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚, Ñ€ĞµĞ·ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ²ÑĞµÑ… Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ñ… Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ¼Ğ°Ñ…, ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑÑ Ğ»Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¿ÑĞ¸Ñ Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞµĞ»ÑŒÑ†Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸, Ñ…Ğ»Ñ‹Ğ½ÑƒĞ²ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ½Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ»ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ’ÑĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹. ĞŸĞ¾ Ğ·Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñƒ Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ½Ñ€Ğ°, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ Ñ€ĞµÑˆĞ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞºÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑĞºÑĞ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ ĞºĞ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ¼ - ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ² Ğ¸ Ñ€ĞµĞ·ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ‹ - Ğ¸ Ğ²Ñ‹ÑÑ‹Ğ»Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ²Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ¿Ğ¿Ñ‹ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞºÑƒ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞºÑĞ°. ĞĞ´Ğ½Ğ°ĞºĞ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»ĞµĞ¼Ğ° Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ€ĞµÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ, Ğ¸ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¸Ğº ÑĞºÑĞ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°, Ğ“Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¤Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½, Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ² Ñ‡ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ‹ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ñ‹Ñ€ĞºĞ¸, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ñ… ÑĞ°Ğ¼ Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ğ». Ğ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´ - ĞºĞ°Ğº Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·-Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒ "Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞ¸Ğ»Ñ‹", Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ‘Ğ½ĞºĞ° Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞ»Ğ°ÑÑŒ - Ğ½ĞµĞ¸Ğ·Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºÑƒĞ´Ğ° Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞºÑĞµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ²Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑŒ Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒÑ Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ° (Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ñ Ñ‡ÑƒĞ¶ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ°Ñ), Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞµ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‡Ğ°Ğ²ÑˆĞ°ÑÑÑ, Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ‚ ĞµĞ¹-Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ³ĞµĞ½Ğ¾Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ´. Ğ˜ Ñ‚ĞµĞ¿ĞµÑ€ÑŒ Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ - Ñ Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼ ÑĞ¾ÑĞ»ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ñ†Ñ‹, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞ·Ğ½ĞµĞµ Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ… "Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ²".

Ğ Ğ°Ğ·ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ÑÑ, Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ†ĞµÑÑ Ñ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¸Ğ¼ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑĞ´ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹, Ğ¸ "ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±ĞºĞ° Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‡" Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ²ĞµĞ»Ğ°. ĞŸĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ "ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»ĞºĞ° Ñ Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼", Ğ° Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ±Ğ¾ĞµĞ²Ğ¸Ğº, Ñ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ½ĞµĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ…, Ğ½Ğµ Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆÑ‘Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ¿ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¾Ğº Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑˆÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¼Ğ°, Ğ²Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğµ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ ĞºĞ¸ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ñ‡ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğµ-Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ·Ğ°. Ğ‘Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ñ… ÑÑ†ĞµĞ½ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞµ, ÑÑ€ĞµĞ¶Ğ¸ÑÑĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ´ÑƒÑ "Ğ¿ÑÑ‚Ñ‘Ñ€ĞºÑƒ", Ñ‚ĞµĞ¼ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞµ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ² Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ¼ Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€ÑĞ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ğµ, Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞµ Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ, Ğ½ĞµĞ¶ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğµ. ĞšĞ°Ğº Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¼ "ĞŸÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ‹Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‘Ğ»" Ñ Ğ»Ğ°Ğ·ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ†ĞµĞ»Ğ¾Ğ¼? Ğ Ğ¿ÑƒĞ»ĞµĞ¼Ñ‘Ñ‚? Ğ ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ÑĞºĞ°Ñ Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ°? Ğ Ğ¿ÑƒÑˆĞºĞ°-Ñ‡Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ½Ğ°Ñ Ğ´Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°? Ğ Ğ´Ğ²Ğµ ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ, Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ¼ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ñƒ Ñ‡ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑ‹? Ğ”Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¶Ğ½ĞµĞ¼ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ Ğ¨ĞµĞ¿Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»ĞµĞºĞ¾ Ğ½Ğµ ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ±Ğ°Ğº - Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ° Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ…Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ³Ğ°ĞµÑ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¾ĞµĞ²Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ¾Ğ¼, Ğ° Ğº ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ½ĞºĞ°Ğ¼ Ñ†ĞµĞ¿Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‰ÑŒÑ ÑƒÑĞ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ñ‘Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑƒÑ‡Ñ‘Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ° (Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ ÑˆÑ‚ÑƒĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ñ Ğ´Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ ÑĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼). ĞĞµÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ñ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¸Ğ¼ Ğ°Ñ€ÑĞµĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ñ Ğ±Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ½ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ³Ğ¾. Ğ¥Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ, Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¶ĞµĞ½ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ, Ğ²Ñ€Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ·Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑÑÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€ÑÑ‡ÑŒ Ğ¼Ñ‹ÑˆÑ†Ñ‹ Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‹, Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ğº Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ±Ğ¾ĞµĞ²Ğ¸ĞºĞ° Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ°. Ğ’Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ğµ Ñ ÑĞ¾ÑĞ»ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ñ†Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑƒÑ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ğµ, Ğ·Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ğ´ĞºĞ¸ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€ĞµÑˆĞ¸Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğµ, Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ² ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ² ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ÑŒÑˆĞµ. 7 personnes ont trouvÃ© cette Ã©valuation utile

RecommandÃ©
9.6 h en tout
Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 29 fÃ©vrier 2020
Produit reÃ§u gratuitement

Great side game.
New weapons, new enemies, and a lonely journey. Half Life.

I think some of the levels were not really as well designed. Walking to different areas, trying to continue the story shouldnt be such a hassle. Maybe I'm dumb but there were certainly parts where I had to use other methods to get past barriers like gernade jumping. I doubt that was how I was supposed to do it, and if I didn't know how to do it I probably would have been stuck for twice as long. When I get past these barriers sometimes I look back and it just completely baffles me, how was I suppoed to get there in the first place?
Final boss felt like a dissappointment. I honestly thought it was a miniboss. The journey to the final boss was alright.
It's harder than the original half life at times but it makes for a fun experience. Not as good as the original. It is also shorter, and has a lacking story.
Some of the new weapons could have been used more for more interesting fights. Some of them were basically reskins of older weapons but with higher damage. The original half life had a problem where there were so many weapons but you only ended up using 3 for most of the game because the other weapons are just downgrades. This game forces you to switch at times but it still has that problem.
I played it for free, and I dont think I regret that.
 
neavlof

Ã‰valuation publiÃ©e le 30 octobre 2020
It's not as long as the base game it packs just as much punch, the new squad mechanics and weapons make it my favorite of the original three half life installments and it still feels like classic Half Life even though it was made by Gearbox. If you have the original this is essential.

Ğ’ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğµ 13 Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ², Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑÑ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ±Ñ‹ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾. ĞĞ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ ÑÑĞ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼Ğ¸ÑÑĞ¸Ğ¹, Ğ·Ğ´ĞµÑÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ÑÑƒÑ‚ÑÑ‚Ğ²ÑƒĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞµÑ€. Ğ¯ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑˆĞ»Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ñƒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑ, Ğ¿Ğ»ÑÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° Ğ½Ğ° ÑĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ñ€ĞµĞ¶Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğµ.
Ğ¥Ğ¾Ñ‡Ñƒ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ»ÑÑÑ‹:

Ğ¡ÑĞ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹, Ğ´Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¸Ğ·ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº ÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ "Ğ˜Ğ½Ñ†ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ² Ğ§ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞœĞµĞ·Ğµ" ÑĞ¾ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ñ‹ "ĞšĞ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹" Ñ‚.Ğµ Ğ‘Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ†Ğ¾Ğ² HECU.
ĞÑƒ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ĞµÑ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ ĞšĞ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ±ÑŒÑÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¾ Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾..

Hey, so i heard you liked half-life? What if i told you that there was an equally as fun game within the same universe?
Opposing Force delivers, it brings in new maps, old maps, new guns, old guns, all around a fun experience. Also the ending is kinda sad, but HEY that doesn't matter cause you're gonna have a good time.
 
Sooper
